16a1d9c6-4913-452a-958a-8f2cdfbf42b6.name: deployment.environment
16a1d9c6-4913-452a-958a-8f2cdfbf42b6.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'envoy_server_uptime'
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
HAVING `deployment.environment` != ''
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

06f344d8-e00b-4492-8af2-d85a21bb9907.description: Select specific Envoy service to filter metrics
06f344d8-e00b-4492-8af2-d85a21bb9907.name: service_name
06f344d8-e00b-4492-8af2-d85a21bb9907.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service_name') AS service_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'envoy_server_uptime'
GROUP BY service_name
HAVING service_name != ''
ORDER BY service_name ASC

12c59825-2862-49b3-bf6a-dc3841e78ea6.description: Kubernetes namespace where Envoy is deployed
12c59825-2862-49b3-bf6a-dc3841e78ea6.name: k8s_namespace_name
12c59825-2862-49b3-bf6a-dc3841e78ea6.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_namespace_name') AS k8s_namespace_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'envoy_server_uptime'
GROUP BY k8s_namespace_name
HAVING k8s_namespace_name != ''
ORDER BY k8s_namespace_name ASC

47f58608-85a8-4583-a09f-5b8a21ceb610.name: k8s_cluster_name
47f58608-85a8-4583-a09f-5b8a21ceb610.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_cluster_name') AS k8s_cluster_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'envoy_server_uptime'
GROUP BY k8s_cluster_name
HAVING k8s_cluster_name != ''
ORDER BY k8s_cluster_name ASC
